message: Bob, I'm offering you the chance to acquire a unique and valuable product.  I believe it holds immense potential for you and your business. While I can't disclose all the details, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000.  This represents a significant opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a potentially advantageous price.  Let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss further details.
